name: Lil Duke's Scoop Shooter (Pre-Alpha Prototype)
description:
Hey!

First of all, Thanks for checking out the game we have in development!

Keep in mind - this is an EXTREMELY early version of the game. This is mostly to gauge interest and get feedback.

The controls are simple:

  • Mouse to Aim
  • Click to shoot
  • WASD to move

The game is an homage to a classic arcade shooter - Asteroids! Dodge or destroy the tomatoes that come hurdling towards you! Be careful of the menacing Broccoli Ship that won't stop until its defeated!

Please leave a comment with your thoughts on the game!

Thank you!
